ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Brokerage_Scheme__r.Type__c ,"Local" ) , NOT(ISNULL( Base_Brokerage_for_OS_NRI__c )) , NOT(ISNULL( Additional_Brokerage_for_OS_NRI__c )) , NOT(ISNULL( Total_Brokerage_for_OS_NRI__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Additional Brokerage for OS/NRI Should be blank
